Body: Date: Thu, 21 Nov 1996 20:22:27 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5.2 Last-modified: Thu, 21 Sep 1995 18:23:44 GMT Content-type: text/html Content-length: 1121 Ray, Sylvian Sylvian R. Ray Areas of research interest: Artificial Intelligence :   We concentrate on designing neural network based systems which are applicable to interpretation of signals arising in biomedical applications.
